name: Clearnet HTTPS support for apps
description: This App helps advanced users to generate custom nginx proxy config and setup SSL Certificates for HTTPS access.

app_page_content.heading: Instructions
content: Using Clearnet App requires from you
b) purchased domain name amd working nameserver capable to publish CNAMEs for @domain.tld,
c) public internet address on router which traffic can be forwarded to private network and
d) automatically updating Dynamic DNS Service for update DNS as public IP changes.
1) Setup DNS CNAME's to your DNS Server
2) Make router modem port forwarding configuration
3) Open Dynamic DNS Service and configure it to update your DNS Server (Static IPs ok too)
and After those work, this App will automatically
I) Apply for certificates and handle their renewals
II) Handle Dynamic DNS Updates on IP change (Static IPs ok too)
III) Setup nginx configurations to create Public Apps accessible from Internet
